Specification: On-chip memory: 128-KB ROM, 16-KB RAM, 4-KB data flash memory
Size: 53 mm x 85 mm; thickness: 1.6 mm
VCC: 3.3 V to 5.5 V. MCU operation voltage range 1.6 V to 5.5 V.
USB connector: VBUS (5 V input); VBUS is converted to 3.3 V by LDO.
Reset switch x 1; user switch x 1
Power indicator: green x 1, user: green x 2, ACT LED: green x 1
Connector: 6 pins x 1, 8 pins x 2, 10 pins x 1 The interface is compatible with ArduinoTM UNO R3.
